title: Last Night Was a Game Changer (Ep 1330)
description:
In this episode, I address the incredible highlights from the Republican National Convention. The speakers last night made the Democrats’ convention look like amateur hour. 

News Picks:


The Lincoln Project gets busted lying, again! 


The GOP Convention was more traditional.

Senator Tim Scott owns the night. 

Ukrainian flagged as a spy by the collusion hoaxers actually had extensive contacts with the Obama administration. 

The Spygate lawyer’s guilty plea suggest that Spygate corruption goes way higher.
